fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

garden_fountain.name: Garden Fountain
garden_fountain.description: Multi-colored foundtain, good for family use, supervision children under 12.

smoke_bombs.name: Smoke Bombs
smoke_bombs.description: Multi-colored smoke release are safe for any age.

boom_chicka.name: Boom Chicka
boom_chicka.description: Bright, noisey canon with 3 multi-tiered shots.

justice_league.name: Justic League
justice_league.description: Red, white and blue canon with added boom and whistle.

ballpark.name: Ballpark
ballpark.description: Multi-colored canon show with 5 minutes of fireworks, spaced 30 seconds apart.

line_item.name: Line Item
line_item.description: Budget option, 90 second canon show with shells spaced 20 seconds apart.

kitchen_sink.name: Kitchen Sink
kitchen_sink.description: Our most intensive fireworks show, with 7 solid minutes of uninterupted shells

stump_no_more.name: Stump No More
stump_no_more.description: Small landscape explosive for removing small stumps

keep_rocking.name: Keep Rocking
keep_rocking.description: Small landscape explosive designed specifically for breaking up rocks into managable pieces.

garden_maker.name: Garden Maker
garden_maker.description: Small landscaping explosive designed to break up everything in a 2 foot radius

molehill_mover.name: Molehill Mover
molehill_mover.description: Designed for minor landscape renovation, 2 feet or less.

hill_mover.name: Hill Mover
hill_mover.description: Designed to reshape landscape 4 feet in height or less.

yard_be_gone.name: Yard Be Gone
yard_be_gone.description: Our most powerful noncommerical explosive, designed to level everything in a 20 foot radius.

dirt_mountain_mover.name: Dirt Mountain Mover
dirt_mountain_mover.description: Commerical grade explosive, designed to reshape dirt landscape.

stone_moutain_mover.name: Stone Mountain Mover
stone_moutain_mover.description: Commerical grade explosive, designed to reshape bedrock.

what_moutain.name: What Mountain
what_moutain.description: Designed for maximum reshaping of landscape, regardless of composition.

shack_killer.name: Shack Killer
shack_killer.description: Commerical grade explosive, designed to level small buildings.

mansion_killer.name: Mansion Killer
mansion_killer.description: Commerical grade explosive, designed to level medium building.

downtown_killer.name: Downtown Killer
downtown_killer.description: Commerical grade explosive, designed to level city blocks.
